tool_description: Check any email address for validity or disposable domain.  Keep spam users out..
title: Free Email Verification

api_list.name: Email Verification
api_list.description: Input the email address you would like verified. The results will be retrieved shortly.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com/multi/{email}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Domain Verification
api_list.description: Input only the domain of the email address to test for just an existing MX server.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com/domain/{domain}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
